item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Tonite we will meet to discuss ways to help fund Daria Novak's campagin. We are very much behind her in her efforts to reform policies in DC. We are not "ENDORSING", we are merely "SUPPORTING" a woman who is right for the job.

Also, we want to review the possibilitly of having a PINK SLIP TEA PARTY.

Please come and join us. The door is always open. Email me for directions and phone number to their home.


In Patriotism,

Carole
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Carole's Red and Silver Bronco
item.name: NCC Bi-Weekly Meetup @ Jim and Ginny's House
